summary: After marrying a handsome man she barely knows, a woman experiences threatening calls and violent attacks from a mysterious woman who claims to be her new husband's former lover.
cast: Nastassja Kinski|Stewart Bick|Maxim Roy|Jack Langedijk|Victoria Snow|Gordon Pinsent|Frank Schorpion|Edward Yankie|Noel Burton|Paulina Abarca-Cantin|Gary Plaxton|Kathleen Fee|Andrew Jason Wade|Charles S. Doucet|Russell Yuen|Daniel Pilon|Amanda Strawn|Linda Goodwin|Julian Brewster
title: Blind Terror
